headline: Show HN: Explore random selections of books with Wikipedia pages
description: This is an update of a prior randomizer, which I previously did not realize only contained around 200 entries. By extracting the dump of all titles of English entries in Wikipedia containing "(books)" here (http://dumps.wikimedia.org/enwiki/latest/enwiki-latest-all-t...), I developed a randomizer that contains all books currently accompanied by articles. This is one way to find noteworthy books to read.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 用维基百科页面探索随机选择的书籍
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 用維基百科頁面探索隨機選擇的書籍
